Source code for pyrfu.pyrf.iso2unix

#!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
iso2unix.py

@author : Louis RICHARD
"""

from astropy.time import Time



[docs]def iso2unix(t=None):
	"""
	Converts time in iso format to unix

	Parameters
	----------
	t : list of str
		Time.

	Returns
	-------
	out : list of float
		Time in unix format.

	"""
	
	if t is None:
		raise ValueError("iso2unix requires at least one argument")

	out = Time(t, format="iso").unix
	
	return out
